guidelines.title: Code of Conduct
guidelines.description: All contributors are expected to adhere to the project's code of conduct to maintain a respectful and inclusive environment.

guidelines.title: Issue Reporting
guidelines.description: Contributors should check existing issues and follow the issue template when reporting bugs or suggesting features to provide sufficient context and ensure efficient handling.

guidelines.title: Pull Requests
guidelines.description: Pull requests should be well-documented, follow the project's coding standards, and include tests to ensure new code does not introduce issues.

guidelines.title: Branching Strategy
guidelines.description: Contributors should create new branches for their work and avoid committing directly to the main branch to maintain project stability.

guidelines.title: Commit Messages
guidelines.description: Commit messages should be clear and descriptive to provide meaningful history and make it easier to understand changes.

guidelines.title: Code Reviews
guidelines.description: All code changes should undergo code review to maintain code quality and encourage knowledge sharing among contributors.
